Class CardGameNPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • NPC
        • InformationNPC
          • CardGameNPC

  • public class CardGameNPC
extends InformationNPC
    The CardGameNPC class is created so that NPCs can be added to the game which the player can play a Card game against.

    CardGameNPC

    Date: 2016/06/01

    Version:
    1 2016/06/01
    Author:
    David White

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Entity

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardGameNPC(java.lang.String character, int x, int y, Deck deck, Sprite textBack, java.lang.String afterGameText)
      This constructs a new instance of the Card game NPC class with a specified character model, the specified x and y coordinates, and the specified Deck.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardGameNPC

        public CardGameNPC(java.lang.String character,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   Deck deck,
                   Sprite textBack,
                   java.lang.String afterGameText)
        This constructs a new instance of the Card game NPC class with a specified character model, the specified x and y coordinates, and the specified Deck.
        Parameters:
        character - the model the be loaded.
        x - the x coordinate to be started at.
        y - the y coordinate to be started at.
        deck - the Deck that the NPC will play with.
        textBack - the Sprite used behind the displayed text.
        afterGameText - the text that the NPC will say after they have been played against.

    • Method Detail

      • setBattled

        public void setBattled(boolean battled)
        This method is used to set whether or not the NPC has been played against.
        Parameters:
        battled - sets whether or not the NPC has been played against.

      • battled

        public boolean battled()
        This method returns the value of the battled variable.
        Returns:
        true if the NPC has been played against.

      • deck

        public Deck deck()
        This method returns this NPC's deck.
        Returns:
        Deck the NPC's deck.

      • interact

        public void interact(OpenWorldPanel panel)
        This is an overriden method which will be called when the NPC is interacted with.
        Overrides:
        interact in class InformationNPC
        Parameters:
        panel - This is the OpenWorldPanel that will be used during the interaction.

        This method returns the type of the NPC as an integer.
